text: Nizhnetashevo () is a rural locality (a village) in Abitovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 76 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 37 km from Meleuz, 14 km from Basurmanovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Nizhnetashevo
